description: A typing practice app with plenty of features. Free and open source.

description: Reasonably-priced plans, focused on jigs, tools, and shop utilities.

name: The Wood Database
description: Information and statistics for hundreds of species of wood.

name: Public-APIs
description: A comprehensive list of public APIs across a wide range of categories.

name: Tech Icons
description: Free SVG icons for almost any popular library, framework, or software.

description: An easy-to-use reference for HTML symbol codes.

description: A list of every HTML color name, along with their respective hex and rgb codes.

name: J Perm
description: Thorough guides to methodically solving many popular twisty puzzles.

name: Picular
description: A color picker based on Google Images results. Useful for generating a color based on just a description.

description: A cube timer webapp with plenty of useful features, as well as a clean and intuitive UI.

name: 365Chess Analysis Board
description: A free tool with turn-level evaluation and suggested lines.

description: An open-source reference for Markdown, written in Markdown.

description: An API for plant information. Provides common and scientific names, growth information, images, and more.

description: An exhaustive type study of vintage Stanley hand planes, along with a handy dating flowchart.

description: Free SVG icons for AWS services.

description: A wiki-style resource for any twisty puzzle. Includes timers, simulators, solvers, and a lot of good information.

name: Sharpening Handbook
description: Thorough instructions and diagrams relevant to almost any tool or blade shape.

name: Chime Design and Build
description: Anything and everything you need to know if you're thinking about making a set of wind chimes.
